version_description:
What's new in version 2.6?
- Ability to change songs from Spotify using the in app buttons
->To set Spotify as the main music player, select it in settings view.
- 10+ filters are now available for videos/photos
- Music automatically resumes playing after viewing video
- Fixed bug for sharing video
- Loads in record mode on start
- Performance improvements
Bug fixes and improvements.
Minor improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

This update includes:
- iOS 11 support
- Layout changes
- **NEW FEATURE** Hold camera button to take infinite amount of photos
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and improvements.

Support for iPhone X/iPad

New Features
------------
- Combine multiple videos. Merge an unlimited amount of videos selected from camera roll or recorded
- Support for 4K recordings with compatible phones
- Fullscreen mode tapping on any photos or videos being viewed
- Mute videos when previewing it

And as always improvements

Enhancements
UI changes
Bug fixes
Fix crash on iPhone 7 Plus

V. 3.5.9
New feature: Delete any photo or video using the image editor.

Fixed issue where you couldn't record in certain video formats.
For supported devices:
- 4k 60 fps is now displayed as an option.
- Videos are now saved in HEVC format.

Performance improvements and UI enhancements.

Improvements
New filters

This update has new features, improvements and bug fixes.
New Features:
- New Music player UI design
- Youtube! Now you can search for youtube videos and record
-> To change your music platform,
go to settings and select youtube,
then press the music button to search for videos
- Grid! Take better photos and record better videos with the new camera grid!
- Never loose your videos again. Video recovery options if device storage is full!
Performance improvements and bug fix
Saving videos is much faster now!

- Fixed issue where video would fail to save when app goes in background
- Background changes to help prepare for future features
- More bug fixes and improvements

- New feature with the ability to remove sound from any video
- Authentication and video back up option for videos. This is recommended for anyone recording long videos.
- View cache and modify
- Auto focus enhancements
- UI Improvements for iPhone X
- Saving enhancements for filtering and merging videos
- Bug fixes and improvements

4.0.4
-Fix issues with memberships

4.0.3
- New feature with the ability to remove sound from any video
- Authentication and video back up option for videos. This is recommended for anyone recording long videos.
- View cache and modify
- Auto focus enhancements
- UI Improvements for iPhone X
- Saving enhancements for filtering and merging videos
- Bug fixes and improvements

Cache viewer performance improvements
Ability to view video while saving
More improvements

- Adjust while balance (red, green, blue) individually before or during a live recording or photo
- Adjust iso manually and control over exposure before or during a live recording or photo
- Adjust manual focus before or during a live recording or photo
- Video saving improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements

4.0.12
- Displaying correct message for saving

4.0.11
- Adjust while balance (red, green, blue) individually before or during a live recording or photo
- Adjust iso manually and control over exposure before or during a live recording or photo
- Adjust manual focus before or during a live recording or photo
Bug fixes and improvements

-Fix issue where Spotify wasn't loading all music tracks
-Shuffle feature for Spotify
-Ability to turn on and off continuous face detection

Bug fixes and improvements

UI improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Enhancements
Bug fixes and improvements
Fix issue where screen was locking during recording session

Did you know you can record selfie videos at 60 frames per second?
You now have the ability to choose different camera types and formats for both front and back camera.

Supported camera types depending on device:
- True Depth
- Dual Camera
- Wide Angle
- Telephoto Camera

Camera format settings can be chosen by a mixture of frames per second, pixels, iso, focus and zoom range.

And as always bug fixes and improvements

Bug fixes, enhancements & improvements

4.2.5
Did you know you can record selfie videos at 60 frames per second?
You now have the ability to choose different camera types and formats for both front and back camera.

Supported camera types depending on device:
- True Depth
- Dual Camera
- Wide Angle
- Telephoto Camera

Camera format settings can be chosen by a mixture of frames per second, pixels, iso, focus and zoom range.

And as always bug fixes and improvements

What's new?
New shuffle and repeat features those using in app music player!

Bug fixes and performance improvements

V 4.2.8
Video timer will now change position depending on recording orientation.
Zoom has been enhanced and has new UI.
UI animation is much more responsive.
Videos will now attempt to save even if an error occurs.
Interrupted sessions are now handled.
Other minor fixes and improvements.

New feature:
You can now import multiple audio and video (mix & match) files to play while recording videos. You can choose to import files from you iCloud or Camera Roll. View imported files. Imported videos can also be displayed over camera screen so that you can watch as you record.

- Better algorithm to display more cached videos. Videos that fail to save can be found in cache.
- Fix UI issue for music player on some of the older devices.
- Music selection options now display a description of what is provided on selection.
- iPad fixes where the camera would output incorrect orientation.
- Fix issue where the video timer would reset on certain actions while recording.

Your feedback is very much appreciated and helps make Media Monster better.
Happy Recording!

- You can now add music to videos!
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Fix issue where iPads were crashing when trying to use import music option

This update includes a new feature that lets you take control of your camera using the volume buttons and Bluetooth remote control. This feature can be enabled in settings and works with iOS-friendly remote controls. It will let you capture photos and toggle recordings.

- Enhancements for zoom slider
- Authenticate with Spotify via Safari
- Support for the latest iOS update
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Accessing video cache is now available for everyone
- Resolve bug fixes

New features giving you the ability to toggle certain camera preferences:
- Face detection
- Volume shutters
- Mirroring
- Start on front camera
- Adjust zoom speed
- Add camera settings button to the front page for easier access.
- Made major improvements for recording videos and capturing photos in landscape mode.

- Ultra-Wide-Angle and Triple Camera can now be selected as camera modes
- Modernize UI
- iOS 13 updates and support
- Performance improvements
- Bix fixes

- Ultra-Wide-Angle and Triple Camera can now be selected as camera modes
- Modernize UI
- iOS 13 updates and support
- Performance improvements
- Bix fixes
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Bug fixes and improvements
- Members can now remove the microphone from the recording session
- Members can now upload their videos manually
Bug fixes and improvements
Listen to your music while recording videos. Select your camera type (dual, ultra-wide, triple camera, wide-angle, telephoto, true depth) Live edit. Record. Play. Share.
Bug fixes and improvements

- Enhance existing features
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Spotify will now be in sync with the music from the Spotify app
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Update some UI
- Bug fixes and crashes

- Fix some issues reported for Import media option
- Clean up UI for import media option
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements

- Reduce memory footprint for better performance and support for devices with low memory
- Enhancement for the Import Media option and ability to view video fullscreen while recording
- UI enhancements
- Other reported bug fixes

- New teleprompter feature! Read your script while you record!
- Bug fixes, performance improvements, and UI enhancements

This update reflects changes to some issues reported.
- Fix issue when trying to save videos from Cache.
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you, everyone, for your patience. Your requests and emails are being addressed and although I am not able to respond to them all.

- Introduce new post-editing features (Duplicate, Fast Forward, Loop, Remove Audio, Reverse, Trim)
- Fix merge algorithm
- UI updates for iOS13
- Bug fixes
- Now supporting "Sign in with Apple"

- UI Updates
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Introducing new editing features, convert any video to a boomerang or slow-motion video at a speed you like
- Other minor improvements

- Camera session improvements
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

This new release is a result of feedback and enhancement requests from users like you. Additional enhancements and bug fixes are also included in this version.

We plan to continue adding new features with future releases. We always welcome your feedback and recommendations. Please email us at info@mediamonsterapp.com
